title: [A proclamation against breaking or defacing of monumentes of antiquitie, being set vp in churches or other publique places for memory, and not for superstition]
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)
publisher: In Povvles Churchyarde, by Richarde Iugge and Iohn Cawood, Printers to the Quenes Maiestie,
